synthesis_conditions.washing_method: extracted with 10 mL of dry and degassed DMF for approximately 12 h, refreshed two times
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: dark red-purple crystals suitable for single-crystal X-ray diffraction

synthesis_conditions.preparation_step: Soaking Mn2(DSBDC) in DMF and DCM

solvents.name: N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF)
solvents.amount: 10 mL for DMF soaking, 15 mL for DCM soaking

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: vacuum at 24 °C for 0.5 h for DMF soaked, vacuum at 100 °C for 2 h for DCM soaked

synthesis_conditions.preparation_step: Soaking Fe2(DOBDC) in DMF and DCM

solvents.name: N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF)
solvents.amount: 10 mL for DMF soaking, 15 mL for DCM soaking

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: vacuum at 24 °C for 0.5 h for DMF soaked, vacuum at 100 °C for 2 h for DCM soaked

synthesis_conditions.preparation_step: Soaking Mn2(DOBDC) in DMF and DCM

solvents.name: N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF)
solvents.amount: 10 mL for DMF soaking, 15 mL for DCM soaking

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: vacuum at 24 °C for 0.5 h for DMF soaked, vacuum at 100 °C for 2 h for DCM soaked
